name: Morfin  ∆
dosage:
Subcutant og intramuskulært (voksne). 10 mg. Kan gentages, hvis tilstrækkelig effekt udebliver.
Intravenøst (voksne): 5 mg injiceres langsomt. Kan gentages, hvis tilstrækkelig effekt udebliver.
effect:
Smertestillende. Vækker velvære, virker afslappende.
Virker efter 5 – 15 min ved intramuskulær (i.m.) eller subcutan
(sc.) injektion.
Virker omgående ved intravenøs (i.v.) injektion. Virkningsvarighed: 3 -4 timer
sideEffects:
Svækker vejrtrækningen. 
Kvalme og opkastning.
Hæmmer optagelsen af medikamenter fra mavesækken.
Kan give forstoppelse og hæmme blæretømningen.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Ved overdosering kan vejrtrækningen ophøre. Modgift: Naloxone (5.1)
Denne bivirkning og morfins virkning i øvrigt forstærkes af andre beroligende stoffer som alkohol, sovemidler og lignende. Overdosering er især en risiko ved hurtig injektion. Overdosering sker sjældent ved almindelig dosering. Oberserver vejrtrækningen og ventiler om nødvendigt med ilt (1.1) på ventilationspose og maske (A.1)

name: Morphine Δ
dosage:
Subcutaneously and intramuscularly (adults): 10 mg. May be repeated if the effect is not sufficient.
Intravenously (adults): 5 mg  to be injected slowly. May be repeated if the effect is not sufficient.
form: Injection liquid, 20 mg/ml, NB, NB Strength
effect:
Pain relieving. Gives the patient a feeling of well-being, relaxant. Takes effect after about 5-15 minutes in case of intramuscular or subcutaneous injection.
Takes effect immediately in case of intravenous injection. Effective for 3-4 hours.
sideEffects:
Restricts breathing. Nausea and vomiting.
Restricts the absorption of medicaments from the stomach. May cause constipation and restrict bladder emptying.
storage: Normal temperature. To be protected from light.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical
In case of an overdose, the patient may stop breathing. Antidote: Naloxone (5.1)
This side-effect and the effect of morphine as drowsiness may be increased by the use of other sedatives, such as alcohol, sleeping medicine, ect.. Risk of overdose primarily if the injection is given too quickly. Overdoses are rare in case of normal dosage.
Observe the breathing and if necessary, ventilate by means of oxygen (1.1) ventilations bag and mask (A.1).

name: Naloxon.
dosage:
1.  Naloxon voksne: Der gives omgående 0,8 mg (1 ampul) intramuskulært.
2.  Hvis virkningen udebliver kan behandlingen gentages efter 5 minutter.
form: Injektionsvæske 0,4 mg/ml, ampuller à 2 ml til intramuskulær injektion.
effect:
Naloxon ophæver morfins (bi)virkning.
Virker2-3 minutter efter intramuskulær injektion. Virkningsvarighed: Op til 4 timer.
sideEffects: Rysten, utilpashed og opkastninger (abstinenssymptomer).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Morfin kan forringe eller ophæve vejrtrækningen. Bivirkningen er sjælden og optræder sædvanligvis kun ved meget store overdoser og hyppigst i forbindelse med en hurtig indgivelse i venerne.

name: Naloxone.
dosage:
1.  Naloxone adults: 0.8 mg (1 ampoule) is given immediately intramuscular.
2.  In case of no effect, the treatment may be repeated after 5 minutes.
form: Injection liquid, 0.4 mg/ml, ampoules of 2 ml for intramuscular injection.
effect: Naloxone counteracts the (side)-effects of morphine. Takes effect 2-3 minutes after intramuscular injection. Effective for up to 4 hours.
sideEffects: Shivering, general indisposition, and vomiting.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Naloxon B. Braun).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Morphine may reduce or stop the patient’’s breathing. This side-effect is rare and, usually occers in case of a  large overdose and/or quick intravenous injection.

name: Atropin.
dosage:
Dosis afhænger af forgiftningen. Atropin indgives langsomt intravenøst.
Der startes med 2 mg og fortsættes med yderligere 2 mg efter hver 5 - 10 minutters mellemrum indtil pupillerne begynder at udvide sig.
Giftig dosis er 10 - 20 mg til voksne. Dødelig dosis er ca. 200 mg til voksne.
effect:
Livreddende ved forgiftninger af visse insektgifte.
Virkningen afhænger af gifttype og mængde. Se MFAG tabel 17.
sideEffects: Pupiludvidelse, lysskyhed, tørre slimhinder, hurtig puls, vandladningsbesvær og forstoppelse.

name: Atropin.
dosage:
The dose depends on the poisoning. Atropin is given slowly intravenously.
At first, 2 mg is given, followed by another 2 mg after every 5-10 minutes until the pupils start dialating. Poisonous dose is 10-20 mg for adults.
Lethal dose is about 200 mg for adults.
form: Injection liquid, 0,25 mg/ml for intravenous injection.
effect:
Life-saving in connection with poisonings caused by certain insecticides.
The effect depends on the type and amount of poison. See MFAG table 17.
sideEffects: Dilation of the pupils, photophobia, dry mucous membranes, rapid pulse, dysuria, and constipation.

dosage: Voksne. 12,5 mg 15-30 min. før sengetid.
effect:
Stærkt sløvende
Virker hurtigt efter indtagelse
Virkningen varer op til 6 timer
Virkningen forstærkes af andre sløvende stoffer, herunder alkohol.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions

name: Zolpidem Δ
dosage: Adults. 12,5 mg 15-30 minutes. before bedtime.
effect:
Strong sedative, rapid effect after ingestion, Effective up till 6 hours.
The effect is increased by the use of other sedatives, including alcohol
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions

dosage: 2-20 mg fordelt på flere doser

dosage: 2-20 mg in several doses
effect: Restricts the symptoms of mental disease, anxiety and restlessness. Reduces nausea and vomiting.

name: Erythromycin
dosage:
250- 500 mg x 2-4 dagligt.
Ved alvorlig infektion kan dosis øges til 4 g per døgn. Tabletter gives umiddelbart før måltid.
(Enterotabletter gives senest en time før måltid eller tidligst 2 timer efter).
sideEffects: Madlede, kvalme, mavekneb og forbigående diaré.

name: Erythromycin
dosage:
250-500 mg two-four times daily case of a serious infection, the dose may be increased to
4ga day.
Tablets are given immediately before a meal.
(Enterotablets are given 1 hour before a meal at the latest or 2 hours after a meal at the earliest).
sideEffects: Loss of appetite, nausea, stomach cramp, or transient diarrhoea.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Erycin, Orion Corporation)

name: Clarithromycin
dosage: Voksne: 500 mg x 2 dagligt.
sideEffects: Mavesmerter, kvalme, diarre, smagsforstyrrelser, hovedpine.

name: Clarithromycin
dosage: Adults: 500 mg x 2 daily
sideEffects: Stomach pain, nausea, diarrhoea, taste disorders , headache
validity: 2 years from date of production (Klacid®,BGP Products)

name: Azithromycin
dosage: Voksne: 500 mg x 1-2 dagligt.
sideEffects: Mavesmerter, kvalme, nedsat appetit,  kraftesløshed, svimmelhed, smagsforstyrrelser, hovedpine, hudkløe og hududslæt.

name: Azithromycin
dosage: Adults: 500 mg x 1-2 daily
sideEffects: Abdominal pain, nausea, decreased appetite, weakness, dizziness, taste disturbances, headache, itchy skin and skin rash.

name: Metronidazol
dosage: 400 - 500 mg x 3 dagligt.
sideEffects:
Mavekneb, smagsforstyrrelser, hovedpine, hududslet og svimmelhed. Urinen kan blive farvet mørk.
Kan virke som antabus ved samtidig indtagelse af alkohol.
validity: 3 år fra produktions dato ( Flagyl, Orifarm A/S )
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical. Bør ikke anvendes til gravide.
Anvendes ofte i kombination med andre antibiotika, fx
Ciprofloxacin (7.8) eller Ceftriaxon (7.9)
Må ikke anvendes sammen med 15.1 Dextromethorphan.

name: Metronidazole
dosage: 400 - 500 mg x 3 daily
sideEffects: Bellyache, altered sense of taste, headache, rash, and dizziness. The urine may be coloured black. May cause a reaction similar to that caused by Antabuse in connection with alcohol.
validity: 3 years from date of production  ( Flagyl, Orifarm A/S )
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Should not be given to pregnant patients.
Often used in combination with other antibiotics, e.g. Ciprofloxacin (7.8) or Ceftriaxon (7.9).
May not be used with 15.1 Dextromethorphan

name: Metronidazol
dosage: 500 mg x 3 daglig
sideEffects: Kvalme, opkastning, mavesmerter, diaré, forstoppelse, og smagsforstyrrelse. Mørkfarvet urin. Kan virke som antabus ved samtidig indtagelse af alkohol.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan om nødvendigt anvendes, til gravide.
Anvendes ofte i kombination med andre antibiotika, , fx Ciprofloxacin (7.8) eller Ceftriaxon (7.9). Må ikke anvendes sammen med 15.1 Dexofan.

name: Metronidazole
dosage: 500 mg x 3 daily
sideEffects:
Nausea vomiting, abdominal pain, diarrhea, constipation, and taste disturbance.
Dark colored urine. May cause a reaction similar to Antabuse in connection with alcohol.
validity: 2 years from date of production (Metronidazol , Amgros I/S)
remarks:

May be used during pregnancy, if nessasary.
Often used in combination with other antibiotic,s  e.g. Ciprofloxacin (7.8) or Ceftriaxon (7.9).
May not be used with 15.1 Dextromethorphan

name: Difteritoksoid, Tetanustoksoid "K"
dosage:
Omrystes kraftigt før anvendelse.
0,5 ml intramuskulært.
Suppleres med injektion tetanus immunglobulin (se 7.11).
sideEffects: Feber, Reaktioner på indstiksstedet, Utilpashed, allergisk reaktion.
storage: Opbevares koldt (2-8˚ C). Må ikke fryses. Vaccinen skal kasseres, hvis den har været frosset.

name: Difteritoksoid, Tetanustoksoid "R"
dosage:
To be shaken well before use.
0,5 ml given intramuscular.
To be supplemented by an injection of tetanus immune globulin (see 7.11).
sideEffects: Fever, reactions at the injection site, malaise, allergic reaction.
validity: 3 years from date of production (Difteritoksoid, Tetanustoksoid, SSI).
storage: Store cool (2-8˚ C). Do not freeze. The vaccine must be discarded if it has been frozen.

name: Difteritoksoid, Pertussistoksoid, Tetanustoksoid
dosage:
Omrystes kraftigt før anvendelse.
0,5 ml intramuskulært.
Suppleres med injektion tetanus immunglobulin (se 7.11).
form: Inj. Væske ≥ 2 IU difteritoksoid, 20 mikrogram pertussistoksoid, 20 IU tetanustoksoid.
sideEffects: Feber, Reaktioner på indstiksstedet, Utilpashed, allergisk reaktion.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Difteritoksoid,  Pertussistoksoid, Tetanustoksoid, SSI).
storage: Opbevares koldt (2-8˚ C). Beskyt mod lys. Må ikke fryses. Vaccinen skal kasseres, hvis den har været frosset.

name: Difteritoksoid, Pertussistoksoid, Tetanustoksoid
dosage:
To be shaken well before use.
0,5 ml given intramuscular.

form: Inj. Liquid ≥ 2 IU difteritoksoid, 20 mikrogram pertussistoksoid, 20 IU tetanustoksoid.
sideEffects: Fever, reactions at the injection site, malaise, allergic reaction.
validity: 3 years from date of production (Difteritoksoid, Pertussistoksoid,  Tetanustoksoid, SSI).
storage: Store cool (2-8˚ C). Do not freeze. Protect from ligth. The vaccine must be discarded if it has been frozen.

name: Dicloxacillin
dosage: 1000 mg x 3 daglig
sideEffects: Diarré, Sure opstød, Luft i mave, Kvalme, Opkastning. Hududslæt.
validity: 2 år fra produktions dato (Dicillin, Sandoz A/S)

name: Dicloxacilline
dosage: 1000 mg x 3 daily
sideEffects: Diarrhoea, Acid regurgitation Gas in the stomach, Nausea, Vomiting. Skin rash.
validity: 2 years from production date (Dicillin, Sandoz A/S)

name: Cefalexin
dosage: 250-500 mg x 3-4  daglig
sideEffects: Diarré, Kvalme, Opkastning. Allergisk reaktion.
validity: 3 år fra produktions dato (Keflex, Nordmedica A/S)

name: Cefalexin
dosage: 250-500 mg x 3-4 daily
sideEffects: Nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, allergy
validity: 3 years from production date (Keflex, Nordmedica A/S)

name: Doxycyclin
dosage:
Dosis voksne og børn over 12 år eller over 
45 kg:1 tablet dagligt.
Indtages med et glas vand eller et let måltid uden mælkeprodukter.
Behandlingen udstrækkes fra 1 dag før ankomst til 4 uger efter afrejse fra malariaområdet.
sideEffects: Kvalme, vaginal svamp og toksiske hudreaktioner i forbindelse med sollys.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Må ikke anvendes af gravide eller ammende eller af børn under 12 år.
Direkte sollys bør undgås. Interaktion med mange lægemidler.

name: Doxycycline
dosage:
Dose, adult and children over the age of 12 or 45 kg: 1 tablet daily.
To be taken with a glass of water or a light meal without any milk products.
The prevention starts1 day before arrival and lasts until 4 weeks after departure from the malaria area.
sideEffects: Nausea, vaginal candidiasis, toxic skin reaction in connection with sunlight.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (vibradox®, Sandoz)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical
Not to be used by pregnant or breast-feeding woman or children below the age of 12.
Direct sunlight should be avoided. Interaction with many other medicines.

name: Quinin.
dosage: 10 mg per kg legemsvægt x 3 dagligt i 7 dage
sideEffects:
Øresusen, synsforstyrrelser, kvalme, opkastning og svimmelhed ses hyppigt.
Ved opkastning inden én time efter indtagelse af medikamentet gentages behandlingen.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical uanset resultatet af malariatesten.
Patientens almen tilstand skal bedres og temperaturen blive normal efter 2–3 dages behandling.

name: Quinine.
dosage: 10 mg per kg bodyweight three times daily for 7 days.
effect: Inhibits the proliferation of the malaria parasite
sideEffects:
Buzzing in the ears, visual disturbances, nausea, vomiting, and dizziness are often seen.
If the patient vomits within 1 hour after having taken the medicament, the treatment is repeated.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical regardless of the result of the malaria test. The patient should be recovering and the temperature become normal after 2-3 day´s treatment.

name: Quinin.
dosage: 10 mg per kg legemsvægt x 3 dagligt i 7 dage
sideEffects:
Øresusen, synsforstyrrelser, kvalme, opkastning og svimmelhed ses hyppigt.
Ved opkastning inden én time efter indtagelse af medikamentet gentages behandlingen.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical uanset resultatet af malariatesten.
Patientens almen tilstand skal bedres og temperaturen blive normal efter 2–3 dages behandling.

effect: Inhibits the proliferation of the malaria parasite
sideEffects:
Buzzing in the ears, visual disturbances, nausea, vomiting, and dizziness are often seen.

remarks: Consult Radio Medical regardless of the result of the malaria test. The patient should be recovering and the temperature become normal after 2-3 day´s treatment.

name: Glycerylnitrate
dosage: En resoriblet lægges under tungen straks  - må IKKE synkes. Kan gentages, maximum 3 resoribletter inden for 15 minutter. Hvis smerterne ikke fortager sig, suppleres med morfin (3.4), efter ordination af Radio Medical.
effect: Udvider blodkar i hjertet. Virker indenfor kort tid. Virkningsvarighed: 30-60 minutter.
sideEffects:
Hovedpine, Ansigst rødme, Kraftesløshed. 
Lavt blodtryk, Hjertebanken, Døsighed, Svimmelhed.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Nitroglycerin, Takeda Pharma A/S)

name: Glyceryl  trinitrate
dosage: 1 resoriblets immediately under the tongue - do not swallow. May be repeated, maximum 3 resoribletts  in 15 minute. If the pain does not decrease, supplement with morphine (3.4), after consulting Radio Medical.
effect: Expands the blood vessels in the heart. Takes effect within short time. Effective for 30-60 minutes.
sideEffects:
Headache, Facial flushing, Weakness.
Low blood pressure, Palpitations, Drowsiness, Dizziness.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Nitroglycerin, Takeda Pharma A/S )

name: Isosorbiddinitrat
dosage:
1 tablet tygges og holdes under tungen indtil den er opløst.
Herefter gives 1 tablet 3 gange dagligt. Disse tabletter sluges hele.
effect: Mod hjertekrampe – angina pectoris. Udvider blodkar i hjertet.
sideEffects: Hovedpine, Lavt blodtryk, Hjertebanken og Kvalme

name: Isosorbiddinitrat
dosage:
Chew 1 tablet and hold it under the tongue until the tablet is dissolved.
Then give 1 tablet 3 times a day. These tablets have to be swallowed without chewing.
effect: Heart pain, Angina pectoris. Expand bloodvessels in the heart
sideEffects: Nausea, Fall in blood pressure, Heart palpitations

name: Isosorbiddinitrat
dosage: Medikamentet pustes ind under tungen eller på kindens inderside.1 pust så hurtigt som muligt efter smerters opståen. Kan gentages
effect: Mod hjertekrampe – angina pectoris. Udvider blodkar i hjertet
sideEffects: Hovedpine, lavt blodtryk, hjertebanken og kvalme

name: Isosorbiddinitrate
dosage:
The medicament is sprayed under the tongue or at the inner side of the cheek.
1 spray as soon as possible after the pain has occurred. May be repeated
effect: Heart pain -  Angina pectoris. Expand bloodvessels in the heart
sideEffects: Headache, Fall in blood pressure, Heart palpitations and nausea.

name: Acetylsalisylsyre
dosage:
Akut: 300 mg 
Vedligehold: 75 mg dagligt.
sideEffects:
Øget blødningsrisiko.
Risiko for allergiske reaktioner.
Farlig dosis: 150 mg per kg legemsvægt.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato, (Magnyl, Takeda Pharma A/S)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical
MÅ IKKE TYGGES

name: Acetylsalicylic Acid
dosage:
Acute: 300 mg 
Hereafter: 75 mg, daily
sideEffects: Increased risk of bleeding. Risk of allergic reactions.Dangerous dose: 150 mg per kg
validity: 2 years from the date of production, (Magnyl, Takeda Pharma A/S)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical
DO NOT CHEWED

name: Furosemid.
dosage: Individuelt.  40 - 120 mg. Kan gentages efter 30 minutter.
form: Injektionsvæske 10 mg/ml. Ampuller à 2 ml til intramuskulær eller intravenøs injektion.
effect:
Tvinger væske ud af blodbanen via nyrerne til urinblæren, hvorefter væske suges fra lungerne (og andet væv). 
Virker inden for 5 minutter efter IV. injektion. Maksimumeffekt inden 30 minutter.
sideEffects: Ingen relevante.

name: Furosemide.
dosage: Dependent on the patient. 40-120 mg. May be repeated after 30 minutes.
form: Injection liquid 10 mg/ml. Ampoules of 2 ml for intramuscular or intravenous injection.
effect: Extracts fluids from the blood vessel via the kidneys to the urinary bladder, after which the fluid is absorbed from the lungs (and other tissue). Takes effect 5 minutes after I.V injection. Maximum effect within 30 minutes.
sideEffects: No relevant.

name: Propranolol
dosage:
Voksne
Forhøjet blodtryk:. 20 - 40 mg x 2 daglig.
Hjertekrampe  20-40 mg dagligt Hjerterytmeforstyrrelser: 10 - 40 mg x 3-4 dagligt.
Forebyggelse efter blodprop i hjertet:
40 mg x x 3 dagligt, under kontrol af puls og blodtryk.
sideEffects: Træthed, Diarré, Sure opstød, Kvalme, Opkastning, Langsom puls, Åndenød, Raynauds syndrom. Muskelsvaghed, Mareridt, Søvnforstyrrelser.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato, (Propranolol 10 mg, Takeda Pharma A/S)

name: Propranolol
dosage:
Adults. 
Hypertension: 20-40 mg x 2 daily.
Angina: 20-40 mg daily 
Heart rhythm disorders: 10 - 40 mg x 3-4 daily.
Prevention after coronary thrombosis:
40 mg x 3 x daily, under the control of heart rate and blood pressure.
sideEffects: Fatigue, Diarrhea, Heart burn, Nausea, Vomiting, Slow pulse, Shortness of breath, Raynaud's syndrome. Muscle weakness, Nightmares, Sleep disorders.
validity: 5 years from the date of production, (Propranolol 10 mg, Takeda Pharma A/S)

name: Clotrimazole
dosage:
Påfør pudder på det berørte område 
2 - 3 x dagligt.
sideEffects:
Mild brændende fornemelse / irritation (straks efter påføring)
Udslæt, Kløe, Smerter og allergisk reaktion.

name: Clotrimazole
dosage:
Apply the powder to the affected area usually  
2- 3 x daily
effect: Restricts fungus growth in the skin.
sideEffects:
Mild burning or irritation (immediately on use) 
Rash, Itchiness, Pain and Allergic reaction

name: Benzyl benzoate
dosage: Til behandling scab, påfør hele kroppen, undtagen ansigt og hoved, lad det sidde i 24 timer; gentage inden for 5 dage. ELLER  påfør 3 gange med 12 timers mellemrum. Til fjernelse af lus, påfør det berørte område og afvask efter 24 timer. Kan være nødvendigt at gentage 2-3 gange.
